gameObject

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObject.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Description:
    Contains the controllers of the gaming system
    Creates players, describes explosions, renders graphics etc.
    Since:
    2014-03-31
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Team 6

      • createExplosion

        public void createExplosion(int x,
                            int y,
                            int size,
                            int strength)
        Responsible for detailing attributes of the explosion such as size and damaging effect

        Inputs:
        x,y - coordinates of fire
        size - size of explosion
        strength - magnitude of damage inflicted to enemy and character from explosion
        Parameters:
        x - X location of center of explosion
        y - Y location of center of explosion
        size - the radius of explosion
        strength - how much damage the explosion does
